verses.verse: And it came <WH1961> to pass on the eighth <WH8066> day, <WH3117> that Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> Aaron <WH175> and his sons, <WH1121> and the elders <WH2205> of Israel; <WH3478>

And he said <WH559> to Aaron, <WH175> Take <WH3947> you a young <WH1121> <WH1241> calf <WH5695> for a sin <WH2403> offering, and a ram <WH352> for a burnt <WH5930> offering, without <WH8549> blemish, <WH8549> and offer <WH7126> them before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

And to the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> you shall speak, <WH1696> saying, <WH559> Take <WH3947> you a kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795> for a sin <WH2403> offering; and a calf <WH5695> and a lamb, <WH3532> both of the first <WH1121> year, <WH8141> without <WH8549> blemish, <WH8549> for a burnt <WH5930> offering;

Also a bullock <WH7794> and a ram <WH352> for peace <WH8002> offerings, to sacrifice <WH2076> before <WH6440> the LORD; <WH3068> and a meat offering <WH4503> mingled <WH1101> with oil: <WH8081> for to day <WH3117> the LORD <WH3068> will appear <WH7200> to you.

And they brought <WH3947> that which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> before <WH413> <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150> and all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> drew near <WH7126> and stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

And Moses <WH4872> said, <WH559> This <WH2088> is the thing <WH1697> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> that you should do: <WH6213> and the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> shall appear <WH7200> to you.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to Aaron, <WH175> Go <WH7126> to the altar, <WH4196> and offer <WH6213> your sin <WH2403> offering, and your burnt <WH5930> offering, and make an atonement <WH3722> for yourself, and for the people: <WH5971> and offer <WH6213> the offering <WH7133> of the people, <WH5971> and make an atonement <WH3722> for them; as the LORD <WH3068> commanded. <WH6680>
Aaron <WH175> therefore went <WH7126> to the altar, <WH4196> and slew <WH7819> the calf <WH5695> of the sin <WH2403> offering, which <WH834> was for himself.

And the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> brought <WH7126> the blood <WH1818> to him: and he dipped <WH2881> his finger <WH676> in the blood, <WH1818> and put <WH5414> it on the horns <WH7161> of the altar, <WH4196> and poured <WH3332> out the blood <WH1818> at <WH413> the bottom <WH3247> of the altar: <WH4196>

But the fat, <WH2459> and the kidneys, <WH3629> and the lobe <WH3508> above <WH4480> the liver <WH3516> of the sin <WH2403> offering, he burnt <WH5930> on the altar; <WH4196> as the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>
And the flesh <WH1320> and the hide <WH5785> he burnt <WH8313> with fire <WH784> without <WH2351> the camp. <WH4264>

And he slew <WH7819> the burnt <WH5930> offering; and Aaron's <WH175> sons <WH1121> presented <WH4672> to him the blood, <WH1818> which he sprinkled <WH2236> round <WH5439> about on the altar. <WH4196>
And they presented <WH4672> the burnt <WH5930> offering to him, with the pieces <WH5409> thereof, and the head: <WH7218> and he burnt <WH6999> them on the altar. <WH4196>
And he did wash <WH7364> the inwards <WH7130> and the legs, <WH3767> and burnt <WH6999> them on the burnt <WH5930> offering on the altar. <WH4196>

And he brought <WH7126> the people's <WH5971> offering, <WH7133> and took <WH3947> the goat, <WH8163> which <WH834> was the sin <WH2403> offering for the people, <WH5971> and slew <WH7819> it, and offered <WH2398> it for sin, <WH2403> as the first. <WH7223>
And he brought <WH7126> the burnt <WH5930> offering, and offered <WH6213> it according to the manner. <WH4941>

And he brought <WH7126> the meat offering, <WH4503> and took an handful <WH4390> <WH3709> thereof, and burnt <WH6999> it on the altar, <WH4196> beside <WH905> the burnt <WH5930> sacrifice of the morning. <WH1242>

He slew <WH7819> also the bullock <WH7794> and the ram <WH352> for a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace <WH8002> offerings, which <WH834> was for the people: <WH5971> and Aaron's <WH175> sons <WH1121> presented <WH4672> to him the blood, <WH1818> which he sprinkled <WH2236> on the altar <WH4196> round <WH5439> about,

And the fat <WH2459> of the bullock <WH7794> and of the ram, <WH352> the rump, <WH451> and that which covers <WH4374> the inwards, and the kidneys, <WH3629> and the lobe <WH3508> above <WH5921> the liver: <WH3516>
And they put <WH7760> the fat <WH2459> on the breasts, <WH2373> and he burnt <WH6999> the fat <WH2459> on the altar: <WH4196>
And the breasts <WH2373> and the right <WH3225> shoulder <WH7785> Aaron <WH175> waved <WH5130> for a wave <WH8573> offering before <WH6440> the LORD; <WH3068> as Moses <WH4872> commanded. <WH6680>

And Aaron <WH175> lifted <WH5375> up his hand <WH3027> toward <WH413> the people, <WH5971> and blessed <WH1288> them, and came <WH3381> down <WH3381> from offering <WH6213> of the sin <WH2403> offering, and the burnt <WH5930> offering, and peace <WH8002> offerings.

And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> went <WH935> into <WH413> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> and came <WH3318> out, and blessed <WH1288> the people: <WH5971> and the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> to all <WH3605> the people. <WH5971>

And there came <WH3318> a fire <WH784> out from before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> and consumed <WH398> on the altar <WH4196> the burnt <WH5930> offering and the fat: <WH2459> which when all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> saw, <WH7200> they shouted, <WH7442> and fell <WH5307> on <WH5921> their faces. <WH6440>
